TopicTitle: Why aren't there so many posts on the Addon section of the forum recently?

Articles.Content:
On the title.

A while ago the forums were active as hell as far as I can remember, every 4-8 hours I accessed the forum and a new mod/plugin was released. I know plugins/mods are hard to make but well, maybe that's not the reason.

its been a long time between versions and a lot of people are getting bored. On top of that we should be getting a new version in the next few weeks (crosses fingers) and anyone who does want to make a mod doesn't want to have to update again because 0.20 will break a lot of mods.
